rows.label: qst720503_msg0001
rows.name: Phew. We managed it, just about.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0002
rows.name:
All right, they were a little tougher
than I expected.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0003
rows.name:
I did think that you were
underestimating them.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0004
rows.name:
At any rate, the restoration of
the bridge can begin now.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right. Thank you for your
hard work, everyone.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0006
rows.name:
Laura, when we get back to camp, what
would you say to some more training?

rows.label: qst720503_msg0007
rows.name:
Uh, sure, but we only just finished
fighting.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0009
rows.name:
If we don't temper Hikari's skills a tad,
I'm somewhat apprehensive of the
battles to come.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0010
rows.name:
Hey, wait a second! Just
what is that supposed to mean?

rows.label: qst720503_msg0011
rows.name:
I've noticed you getting a little, well,
careless, to be frank. You need to be
more mindful or we'll never beat Metsu.

rows.label: qst720503_msg0012
rows.name:
Careless? Mindful? Gee, thanks for
the personal attack...

rows.label: qst720503_msg0013
rows.name:
Slow down there.
What's gotten into you?

rows.label: qst720503_msg0015
rows.name:
It doesn't matter how much we
train, I'm not going to magically
become more mindful!
